mapper.select: SELECT CO_IDX, REGDATE, COMM, F_IDX, C.U_ID, U.U_PIC FROM COMM C JOIN USER_INFO U ON C.U_ID = U.U_ID WHERE F_IDX = #{f_idx} ORDER BY CO_IDX
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMM VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(CO_IDX), 0) + 1 FROM COMM), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS'), #{comm}, #{f_idx}, #{u_id})
